title: Tried logging in too many times error?
body: I open the client, I try to log in for the first time and it says "You have tried logging in too many times in a short period of time. Please wait a while before trying." and no matter how long I wait it won't log in or if I exit and try again it keeps saying that. I effectively cannot log in to league of legends.

replies.body: If you still haven't been able to get logged in successfully, double check that you're trying the correct username/password as well as the right region. If that's still not working, go ahead and reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you figure out what's going wrong.
Same problem here. Riot just never gets their shit together.

I've had the same problem on and off this week, thought it was fixed but started up again today. Restarting computer seems to help, but not always. Changing servers back and forth sometimes works too, but less often. Easiest solution, play a different game :P
i had same error and i just ran league of legends as administrator and it worked
Piece of shit game always fucks up exactly when you are in a game and then throws this fucking shit at you
